plot: Lord Petcharawuth, the unmarried heir of a wealthy and snobbish family, hires the young teacher Piramon to help his imbecile brother Paitoon.
title: Wongkamlao
plot_es: Lord Petcharawuth, the unmarried heir of a wealthy and snobbish family, hires the young teacher Piramon to help his imbecile brother Paitoon.
plot_en: Lord Petcharawuth, the unmarried heir of a wealthy and snobbish family, hires the young teacher Piramon to help his imbecile brother Paitoon.
